Article Type__DataCategorySelection.name: Article Type__DataCategorySelection
Article Type__DataCategorySelection.description: A data category selection represents a data category that classifies an article.

DataCategoryGroupName.description: Unique name of the data category group which has categories associated with the article.

DataCategoryName.description: Unique name of the data category associated with the article.

ParentId.description: ID of the article associated with the data category selection.

Article Type__DataCategorySelection.accessRules: Knowledge must be enabled in your org. Not available in Lightning Knowledge. Users can only access, create or delete data category selection visible to their role, permission set, or profile. If a user has partial visibility on an article's categorization, only the visible categories are returned.
